Item.name: Salvaged ORCA Undersuit
Item.description: A Piece of an O.R.C.A; (Omni-protective Radiation-resistant Combined Armor) Set. This armored Undersuit has been renewed using Standard Issue Coalition Body Armor and Uniforms. Can NOT protect from Heavy Water Pressure.

Item.name: Salvaged Modular Vest
Item.description: A Lightweight Modular Combat Vest. Can be worn to provide a small amount of protection from Firearms. Used as a Framework for O.R.C.A (Omni-protective Radiation-resistant Combined Armor) Sets.

Item.name: Light ORCA Vest
Item.description: A Piece of an O.R.C.A; (Omni-protective Radiation-resistant Combined Armor) Set. This Armored Vest has been renewed using Standard Issue Coalition Body Armor.

Item.name: Light ORCA Vest, Dark Orange
Item.description: A Piece of an O.R.C.A; (Omni-protective Radiation-resistant Combined Armor) Set. This Armored Vest has been renewed using Standard Issue Coalition Body Armor.

Item.name: Modified X-ORCA Vest
Item.description: A Piece of an O.R.C.A; (Omni-protective Radiation-resistant Combined Armor) Set. This ORCA Vest has been heavily modified. A Batterycell has been integrated into the Vest; Reactive Armor plating reinforces weak spots and existing armor.

Item.name: Modified M-ORCA Vest, Dark Orange
Item.description: A Piece of an O.R.C.A; (Omni-protective Radiation-resistant Combined Armor) Set. This ORCA Vest has been heavily modified. A Batterycell has been integrated into the Vest; Lightweight Composite Laminate Padding reinforces weak spots and existing armor. A Sturdy Chest Rig has been implemented, allowing stowage of small items.

Item.name: Modified X-ORCA Vest (Light)
Item.description: A Piece of an O.R.C.A; (Omni-protective Radiation-resistant Combined Armor) Set. A Batterycell has been integrated into the Vest; Reactive Armor plating reinforces weak spots and existing armor. A small Spotlight's been attatched to the Vest.

Item.name: Heavy X-ORCA Vest
Item.description: A Piece of an O.R.C.A; (Omni-protective Radiation-resistant Combined Armor) Set. A Batterycell has been integrated into the Vest; Heavy Reactive Armor plating reinforces weak spots and existing armor.

Item.name: Heavy X-ORCA Vest (Light)
Item.description: A Piece of an O.R.C.A; (Omni-protective Radiation-resistant Combined Armor) Set. A Batterycell has been integrated into the Vest; Heavy Reactive Armor plating reinforces weak spots and existing armor. A small Spotlight's been attached to the Vest.

Item.name: Modified M-ORCA Assault Vest, Dark Orange (Assault Collar)
Item.description: A Piece of an O.R.C.A; (Omni-protective Radiation-resistant Combined Armor) Set. A Batterycell has been integrated into the Vest; An Armored Assault Collar Bolsters the Vest's Defense.
